title: Dick's Sporting Goods bans Assault Rifles, Showtime at the Apollo, A Sand and Soul Update, Comedian Earthquake and more
itunes:title: Dick's Sporting Goods bans Assault Rifles, Showtime at the Apollo, A Sand and Soul Update, Comedian Earthquake and more
description:
The Steve Harvey Morning Show discusses Dick's Sporting Goods ban on assault rifles, Showtime at the Apollo, A Sand and Soul Update, prostate cancer awareness, plus Comedian Earthquake visits the show, and more
